statements: UPDATE diversity_hiring_statistics SET hiring_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE report_id = 1001;
UPDATE diversity_hiring_statistics SET department_id = 101, termination_date = '2022-08-31', gender = 'Female' WHERE report_id = 1002;
UPDATE diversity_hiring_statistics SET termination_date = '2023-01-01', gender = 'Male' WHERE report_id = 101
UPDATE diversity_hiring_statistics SET job_title = 'Senior Developer', report_date = '2022-12-31', gender = 'Female' WHERE department_id = 200
UPDATE diversity_hiring_statistics SET total_applicants = 500 WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE hiring_trends SET trend_category = 'Technology', trend_description = 'Growing demand for tech roles' WHERE trend_id = 2;
UPDATE diversity_hiring_statistics SET total_applicants = 500, diversity_applicants = 150 WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE hiring_trends SET trend_category = 'Technology', trend_description = 'Hiring trends in the technology sector have been positive.', trend_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE trend_id = 201;
UPDATE diversity_hiring_statistics SET total_employees = 150 WHERE report_id = 123;
UPDATE employee_demerographics SET education_level = 'Master's Degree' WHERE employee_id = 456;

UPDATE diversity_hiring_statistics SET department_name = 'Engineering', job_title = 'Software Engineer', total_employees = 50, minority_employees = 15, gender_diversity_ratio = 0.3 WHERE report_id = 1001;
UPDATE diversity_initiatives SET impact_score = 95, description = 'This initiative aims to promote diversity and inclusion in the workplace' WHERE initiative_id = 2005;
UPDATE diversity_stats SET hired_diverse_applicants = 20, total_applicants = 100 WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE employee_diversity SET diversity_category = 'Minority' WHERE employee_id = 3;
UPDATE diversity_stats SET total_applicants = 500, diverse_applicants = 200, hired_diverse_applicants = 100 WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE hiring_trends SET trend_description = 'A comprehensive analysis of diverse hiring practices in the industry' WHERE trend_id = 1;
UPDATE diversity_metrics SET hires_count = 20, applicants_count = 30 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE diversity_reports SET report_description = 'Updated report description', last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE diversity_metrics SET applicants_count = 50, hires_count = 10 WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND diversity_category = 'Gender Diversity';
UPDATE diversity_training SET training_type = 'Inclusive Leadership' WHERE training_date = '2022-01-15' AND employee_id = 101;
